title: Montenegro Waterfront Heritage Retreat with Three Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Overlooking the crystal-clear waters of the Bay of Kotor, this retreat is nestled in the charming town of Perast, offering a perfect blend of cultural discovery and seaside relaxation. Unwind on the private beach dock, sip on refreshing cocktails by the pool, or step into the tranquil spa for a treatment that will melt your worries away.

Savour Mediterranean flavours at one of the hotel's three exquisite restaurants, or enjoy a leisurely walk through the cobblestone streets of Perast. For a truly fascinating day of adventure, take a boat ride to the nearby islands of St. George and Our Lady of the Rocks, each home to its own historic church.
